title: Finance Buddy
description: Finance Buddy is a comprehensive full-stack application built using the MERN stack designed to help users manage their expenses efficiently

title: Admin Dashboard
description: Developed an admin dashboard using React and Firebase, enabling user authentication and account creation, improving user management efficiency by 30%.

title: Blogging App
description: Implemented React Router for seamless client-side routing and used hooks (useReducer, useState) and context API, enhancing navigation efficiency by 25%.
